item.title: TSHP-Ep15 This is some scary s**t
item.description: Download Mp3 News Links Yunohost 3.7 Testing asking for feedback We just released a new testing version for YunoHost and would be happy to receive feedback before releasing it as a stable version :yum: This release includes quite important changes in YunoHost’s internal, and therefore requires careful validation to minimize the amount of remaining bugs. Major changes are: - Group and permission mechanism Improvements to detect app installs that broke critical parts of the system.
